arts.ttl: Šeško and Simons shine as Leipzig thrash Augsburg 4-0
arts.sum: RB Leipzig dominated FC Augsburg with a 4-0 victory, featuring a brace from Benjamin Šeško and stellar performances from Xavi Simons and Loïs Openda. Just four minutes later, Šeško doubled Leipzig's lead with a well-placed header from David Raum's pinpoint cross, marking his first Bundesliga brace of the season.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs Augsburg preview: Hosts looking to kickstart form
arts.sum: RB Leipzig host Augsburg this Saturday at Red Bull Arena, and despite the hosts being unbeaten, Marco Rose's side will be looking to get back to winning ways in the Bundesliga after frustrating draws against Union Berlin and St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: Preview: RB Leipzig vs. Augsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and Augsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Rose speaks on RB offensive woes and Xavi Simons' form dip
arts.sum: RB Leipzig trainer Marco Rose addressed his team's lack of offensive impetus when speaking at his Thursday pre-match press conference. The German Red Bulls have failed to score in their last two league fixtures. The Leipzig gaffer attempted to accentuate the positives associated with the squad's performance. Rose also spoke on attacking midfielder Xavi Simons' recent form dip.
